headline: U.S. bank stocks rise after Fed stress test results
summary: Investing.com -- U.S. bank stocks moved higher Monday following the release of the Federal Reserve’s annual stress test results, which Wells Fargo analysts said marked a turning point toward “less onerous, less volatile, and more transparent” regulation.

headline: Trump Tax Bill Hits Senate as GOP Torn by Competing Demands
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Senate Majority Leader John Thune is rushing to meet President Donald Trump’s July 4 deadline for pushing through his massive tax and spending bill, but first he has to work through a list of approximately eight Republican senators who have expressed opposition to portions of it. headline: Wall Street banks are rallying on a 'tale of 2 quarters'
